src/index.ts.changes: Added GET /cache-stats endpoint that exposes cache statistics for monitoring
src/index.ts.implementation: New endpoint requires authentication via authMiddleware, returns CacheStatsResponse type with hits, misses, hitRate, size, maxSize, and enabled flag
src/index.ts.purpose: Provides observability for cache performance and monitoring
src/index.ts.impact: Enables real-time cache statistics monitoring for production environments

src/types.ts.changes: Added CacheStatsResponse interface for type-safe cache statistics
src/types.ts.implementation: Interface defines structure for hits, misses, hitRate, size, maxSize, and enabled properties
src/types.ts.purpose: Provides type safety for cache statistics API responses
src/types.ts.impact: Ensures consistent API contract for cache monitoring

patterns_discovered.endpoint_implementation: Consistent pattern for adding new endpoints following existing routes structure
patterns_discovered.authentication_middleware: Standard use of authMiddleware for protected endpoints requiring authentication
patterns_discovered.type_safety: New interfaces added to types.ts for API response consistency
patterns_discovered.documentation_updates: Root endpoint documentation updated to include new /cache-stats endpoint
patterns_discovered.incremental_progress: Systematic completion of subtasks with clear boundaries and dependencies
patterns_discovered.status_tracking: Multiple tracking systems synchronized across status files, build logs, and implementation plans

gotchas_discovered.authentication_requirements: Cache statistics endpoint requires proper authentication middleware implementation
gotchas_discovered.type_definitions: New endpoint requires corresponding type definitions in types.ts for TypeScript compilation
gotchas_discovered.endpoint_naming: Proper endpoint naming convention (/cache-stats) follows existing API patterns
gotchas_discovered.documentation_consistency: Root endpoint documentation must be updated to reflect new endpoints
gotchas_discovered.test_dependencies: All existing tests must continue to pass when adding new functionality

approach_outcome.approach: Standard endpoint implementation following existing patterns with authentication and type safety
approach_outcome.methodology: Added GET /cache-stats endpoint in src/index.ts with authMiddleware, created CacheStatsResponse type in types.ts, updated root endpoint documentation, verified all tests pass
approach_outcome.implementation_details: Endpoint returns JSON with hits, misses, hitRate, size, maxSize, and enabled flag, requires authentication, follows existing patterns used by /stats endpoint
approach_outcome.validation: All 122 tests continue to pass with new endpoint implementation
approach_outcome.impact: Added monitoring capability for cache performance without breaking existing functionality
